title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1524/90 of 6 June 1990 fixing for the 1990 marketing year the Community offer price for plums applicable with regard to Spain
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1524/90
of 6 June 1990
fixing for the 1990 marketing year the Community offer price for plums applicable with regard to Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. For the 1990 marketing year, the Community offer prices for plums (CN codes 0809 40 11 and 0809 40 19), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packet products of groups I and II of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows for each of the groups of varieties:
1.2.3 //  // Group I   // Group II   // - 11 June to 31 July:   // 65,55   // -   // - August:   // 65,55   // 53,03   // - September:   // 56,62   // 47,99.
2. The groups of varieties referred to in paragraph 1 shall be composed of the following varieties:
Group I:
Altesse double (Italian quetsche), PrĂŠcoce favourite, Belle de Louvain, Conducta, Early Rivers, Kirk's Blue, Jefferson Gage, Luetzelsachser (early Luetzelsachsen quetsche), Anna Spaeth, Ersinger (early Ersingen quetsche), Zimmers (Zimmer quetsche), Buehler (early Buehl quetsche), Burbank, Florentina, Coccia d'oro, Reine-Claude, Czar, Victorias, Damsons and Santa Rosa;
Group II:
Altesse simple (common quetsche, Hauszwetschge), Reine-Claude d'Oullins, Sveskeblommer, Ruth Gerstetter and Ontario.
3. The Spanish offer prices of imported products are to be compared:
(a) with the prices fixed for group I where the imported products belong the varieties other than those shown in (b);
(b) with the prices fixed for group II where the imported products belong the following varieties: Altesse simple (common quetsche, Hauszwetschge), Reine-Claude d'Oullins (Ouillins Gage), Sveskeblommer, Ruth Gerstetter, Ontario, Wangenheimer (early Wangenheim quetsche), Pershore (yellow egg), Mirabelle, Bosniche and Ortenauer.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 June 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
